articles.title: National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
National Meeting Commemorates Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to commemorate the 120th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of the preservation of  revolutionary relics, science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, persons of distinguished services, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also present were delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The revolutionary life of Kim Hyong Jik was a scared one characterized by the noble idea of "Jiwon" (aim high) and the struggle to materialize it, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 The idea of aim high represents the revolutionary outlook on life which calls for finding true worth and happiness in the struggle for the country and the nation and the indomitable revolutionary spirit that Korea's independence should be achieved by the Korean people at any cost by waging a struggle generation after generation.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's revolutionary life serves as a noble example to be followed by the army and people of the DPRK forever.
					
					 Referring to his exploits, the reporter went on:
					
					 His life was a great revolutionary life as it reflected a high sense of responsibility for the future of the nation and the idea of uninterrupted revolution that a revolution should be carried out generation after generation.
					
					 Possessed of ardent love for the future of the revolution, he built schools in different parts of the country even under the conditions of waging a hard struggle for leading the anti-Japanese independence movement and worked heart and soul for the education of younger generation.
					
					 He was the outstanding leader who led the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea along the road of national independence and the great pioneer who made a switchover in the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea to a proletarian revolution from the nationalist movement.
					
					 He was the outstanding revolutionary who provided immensely precious wealth for the pioneering of the revolutionary cause of Juche and its victorious advance with his rare foresight.
					
					 The sacred revolutionary activities and immortal feats of Kim Hyong Jik who devoted his all to the struggle for the independence of the country, freedom and liberation of the people and bright future of the Korean revolution are brilliantly recorded in the history of the country and will always remain shining along with the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 His idea of aim high and his desire were translated into brilliant realities by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean revolution which has made a dynamic advance, giving immense shine to the idea of aim high, is greeting the new era of history for the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for eternally glorifying Kim Hyong Jik's idea of "Jiwon" and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started in Mt. Paektu generation after generation.

articles.title: Jon Pyong Ho Dies
articles.content:
Jon Pyong Ho Dies
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- General of the Korean People's Army Jon Pyong Ho, honorary curator of the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment, died of acute myocardial infraction at 19:00 on July 7, Juche 103 (2014) at the age of 88. 
					 Jon was a veteran revolutionary who devoted his all to the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the Songun leadership of the party and the leader. 
					
					 Born into a poor peasant's family in Jonchon County of Jagang Province on March 20, 1926, he grew up to be an able official under the loving care of the party and the leader after the liberation of the country and devoted all his life to the defence industry. 
					
					 From October 1945 he served in the guards company under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. He bravely fought to protect the headquarters of the revolution at the cost of his life from the desperate moves of the enemies inside and outside the country. 
					
					 Working as a process engineer, department chief and chief engineer of a munitions factory from September 1952 to July 1970, he made a positive contribution to ensuring the munitions production in the wartime and hastening the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 He devotedly worked to defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution by thoroughly implementing the line of simultaneously developing the economic construction and defence capabilities laid down by the President.
					
					 Holding the posts of vice department director, department director and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea from August 1970 and director of the Political Bureau of the Cabinet and chief secretary of its Party Committee from  June 2010 to March 2012, he made a special contribution to turning the KPA into the powerful elite revolutionary army equipped with modern offensive and defensive means and converting the DPRK into a satellite producer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state and devoted himself to carrying out the WPK's line and policy of economic construction.
					
					 Working as honorary curator of the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment from May 2012, he devoted all his wisdom and enthusiasm to the work for conveying the undying revolutionary exploits the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu performed in the field of defence industry to the posterity. 
					
					 He worked as alternate member, member of the C.C., the WPK and as alternate member and member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK from November 1970 to April 2012. 
					
					 He was elected a deputy to the 7th Supreme People's Assembly and worked as a deputy until the 12th SPA. He worked as a member of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK for a long period. 
					
					 He was awarded high state orders and citations including two Orders of Kim Il Sung and Order of Kim Jong Il, the highest orders of the DPRK, the title of Twice Hero of the DPRK and the title of Labor Hero for the distinguished feats he performed for the party and revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 An obituary of Jon Pyong Ho was released in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on July 7. 
					
					 It said that though Jon passed away, the exploits he performed on behalf of the party and revolution and the country and its people will shine long. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK and the NDC of the DPRK announced that the late Jon would be accorded a state funeral, and formed a funeral committee with supreme leader Kim Jong Un as its chairman and 88 officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Hwang Pyong So as its members.
					
					 The funeral committee said that the bier of the deceased is placed at the Sojang Club of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, it would receive mourners from 10:00 to 19:00 on July 9 and the hearse would leave the club at 08:00 on July 10.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Chinese embassy here and families of overseas Koreans related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.
					 Meanwhile, the families placed bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.

articles.title: Reception Given for Families of Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Reception Given for Families of Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- There was a reception for families of overseas Koreans related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung Wednesday. It was given under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there were the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, families of Zhou Wei, Liu Tong-shi, Sun Mingren, Fan Delin, Jiang Zihua, Shang Yue, Chai Shiying and Hu Zhenyi, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, families of So Sun Ok and Li Zade, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, families of Pak Kil Song and Kim Chol, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs in China, families of Kim Sun Ok and Ri Kwan Rin, Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, Jong Il Sim, Korean in Russia, and the family of overseas Korean Son Won Thae related to the revolutionary activities of the President. 
					
					 Present there also were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Im, director of the Party History Institute of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in his address that Kim Jong Un made sure that a reception is given to console families of overseas Koreans related to the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The President embarked on the road of the anti-Japanese revolution in his early years and fought his way through a long journey of bloody war to achieve the historic cause of the country's liberation and built most advantageous socialist Korea centered on the popular masses on this land.
					
					 The President, a man of noble virtue, showed warm loving care for the revolutionary comrades-in-arms whom he had relations with in the period of the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle and for their bereaved families.
					
					 His loving care and benevolence for the families of overseas Koreans related to his revolutionary activities were invariably carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and is being inherited by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic careers of his family members, the members of the delegation went round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 Standing before the brushwood gate of the old home in Mangyongdae, I cannot repress my yearning for Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the benevolent father and great teacher of overseas compatriots.
					
					 Through the remembrance concert hosted by the association this time, the Koreans in China keenly felt once again that the President is the peerless patriot and the greatest man who devoted his all to the happiness of the people all his life.
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of the nation, is always alive in the minds of all Koreans.

articles.title: Art Exhibition in Pyongyang Instills Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
articles.content:
Art Exhibition in Pyongyang Instills Kim Jong Il's Patriotism
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A fine art exhibition on the theme of "Let us step up the building of a thriving country by displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism!" is going on at the Pyongyang International House of Culture.
					 On display there are more than 60 fine art pieces, including Korean paintings, oil paintings, posters, woodcut prints, pencil drawings, embroidery and calligraphy.
					
					 An acryl painting "Visualizing a New History of Golden Mountains" and an oil painting "Opening up a New History of Taegyedo" show the Korean people's deep yearning for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A woodcut print "Buzzing Sound" and pencil drawings "Big Haul" and "Affection" call upon the viewers to work devotedly with Kim Jong Il's patriotism kept in their minds.
					
					 Korean paintings "Spring" and "The Day When They Leave for Military Posts" give a vivid description of the DPRK servicepersons and civilians working hard with patriotism to turn the country into a socialist land of bliss covered with greenery.
					
					 There are also an oil painting "Secret Camp in Spring" and a pencil drawing "Eternal Life" representing the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and the People's Army soldiers in the 1950s, who heroically fought for the country and the people. They instill patriotism and the spirit of devotedly defending the country into every viewer.
					
					 Besides, the exhibits include fine art works showing landscapes of the country.

articles.title: Chongsu Revolutionary Site Visited by Endless Stream of People, Foreigners
articles.content:
Chongsu Revolutionary Site Visited by Endless Stream of People, Foreigners
Sakju, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Chongsu Revolutionary Site is visited by an endless stream of people on the occasion of the 120th birth anniversary of indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Jik.
					 The site in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province is the significant place which Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, visited several times and conducted energetic activities from summer of Juche 1 (1912) to autumn of Juche 10 (1921). 
					
					 He clarified the idea of proletarian revolution and instilled the spirit of the anti-Japanese struggle into the people, youth and students in Chongsudong with his noble intention of "Jiwon" (aim high).
					
					 Standing at the site is the statue of Kim Hyong Jik. There are venues of the Chongsudong meeting and anti-Japanese lecture, Ilsin School where he made its pupils nurture a great intention to liberate the country and Kyolsung Hill which he named and where he organized even a mountaineering competition. 
					
					According to the data available, more than 1,217,000 service personnel, people from all walks of life, school youth and children and foreigners have visited the site over the past decade.

articles.title: Stamp Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Stamp Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued a stamp in commemoration of the 120th birth anniversary (July 10, 1894) of Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					 Seen in the upper part of the stamp are letters "In commemoration of the 120th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea".
					
					 The stamp carries an acryl painting that shows Kim Hyong Jik guiding the Chongsudong Meeting.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik, father of President Kim Il Sung, was a true patriot who had devoted his all to the independence of Korea and its liberation. He was also a pioneer in changing the course of independence struggle from the nationalist movement into the proletarian revolution.

articles.title: History of DPRK Characterized by Independence, Songun and Socialism
articles.content:
History of DPRK Characterized by Independence, Songun and Socialism
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has invariably advanced along the road of independence, Songun (military-first) and socialism, achieving only victories one after another.
					 After President Kim Il Sung passed away on July 8, Juche 83 (1994), the U.S. and its followers asserted that the socialism would have collapsed in the DPRK as seen in the former eastern European countries.
					
					 During the Arduous March, the forced march when the Korean people suffered from innumerable adversities, the U.S. was desperately keen on its moves to economically isolate and stifle the DPRK, floating the fictitious theory on "collapse of socialism in the DPRK within two or three years".
					
					 In the 21st century, too, the U.S. has resorted to every possible means for preventing the DPRK from having trade relations with other countries, accusing it of posing threat to the regional stability, rejecting cooperation in "anti-terrorism" war and not relying on market economy.
					
					 The U.S. has also stopped all sorts of financial and monetary business with the DPRK, while freezing all its assets in America.
					
					 The U.S. even went the length of listing the DPRK as an "axis of evil" and a target of its preemptive nuclear attack and has staged provocative joint military drills against it together with the south Korean warmongers one after another to aggravate the situation in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Moreover, it has instigated its followers to take harsher sanction against the DPRK after taking issue over its satellite launch for peaceful purpose.
					
					 But the Korean people have defeated all hostile acts of the U.S. and reliably defended the sovereignty of the country with powerful nuclear deterrent under the uplifted banner of independence, Songun politics and socialism, upholding leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Now, the cause of independence, Songun and socialism has been creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Only rosy future is in store for the Korean people as they are led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Cutting Tools for CNC Machine Tools Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Cutting Tools for CNC Machine Tools Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- New cutting tools for CNC machine tools have been developed in the DPRK by a researcher of the Metal Engineering Faculty of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					 The new tools made with nano-silicon nitride composite have proved stronger than hard alloy tools in hardness.
					
					 They are highly resistant to heat and oxidation while ensuring safe-cutting for several hours even at 1 100-1 200 degrees centigrade.
					
					 Their cutting speed is three or five times faster than hard alloy tools.
					
					 The Mangang Technology Joint Venture Company is producing those tools.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 7 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 7 Published
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 7 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. This is a library of the Juche idea and the Songun idea which comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order. 
					 It contains 98 works including talks and concluding speeches made by leader Kim Jong Il from August, Juche 52 (1963) to March, Juche 53 (1964).
					
					 In the works such as "Our Leader Is the Great Statesman" he explained that President Kim Il Sung was a great statesman and underscored the need to get a clear understanding of the greatness and exploits of the President and hold him in high esteem.
					
					 In the work "The Media of the Party Should Conduct the Education in Loyalty as a Main Task" he clarified the idea that the media of the Workers' Party of Korea should rally all people around the Party and the leader and thus contribute to stepping up the revolution and construction.
					
					 He clarified principled issues in educating the people in the revolutionary traditions in the works "Let Us Firmly Arm Ourselves with the Brilliant Revolutionary Traditions of Our Party", "It Is Necessary to Effectively Conduct the Education through the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site" and so on.
					
					 The book contains the work in which he indisputably proved the scientific accuracy and validity of the President's idea of enhancing the role of the county in the socialist construction from the viewpoint  of economics and works which extensively dealt with important tasks for bolstering up the People's Army and carrying out the WPK's military line for self-defense.
					
					 Included in the book are works indicating the road of rural construction in the DPRK and works dealing with tasks of teachers and students of Kim Il Sung University to conduct scientific researches as required by the Korean revolution and in conformity with the actual conditions of the country. 
					
					 The book also contains works dealing with the independent and consistent foreign policy of the WPK and works giving perfect scientific answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in the socialist construction.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Wrong Policy on Anti-Personnel Mines
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Wrong Policy on Anti-Personnel Mines
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. biased  policy on the production and possession of anti-personnel mines was disclosed during the recent conference to review the implementation of the convention on the prohibition of anti-personnel mines (Ottawa Treaty) held in Mozambique.
					 A spokesperson for the National Security Council of the White House in a statement clarified that the U.S. government would no longer produce anti-personnel mines and purchase them but, timed to coincide with this, a spokesperson for the U.S. State Department blustered the announcement of a halt to using those mines would not affect the defense of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 This outpouring cannot but be called into question as it is revelation of the U.S. sinister scenario to keep south Korea under its occupation as its bridgehead for carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The convention, which calls for the comprehensive prohibition of the production and use of anti-personnel mines, took effect on March 1, 1999 but the Korean peninsula is left outside the convention though its population is threatened with a great number of mines.
					
					 The U.S. stockpiled 70 percent of its anti-personnel mines in south Korea and the south Korean puppet army possesses at least two million non-self-blasting mines. The number of the mines laid there is estimated to be a million.
					
					 The U.S., the world's largest anti-personnel mine exporter, declared it was not willing to clear the peninsula of the mines which are meant to protect the lives of U.S. soldiers the moment a war breaks out there, making the peninsula an exception under the pretext of the non-existent "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 It was reported that more than one hundred million anti-personnel mines were laid all over the world. As many as 26,000 people fall victim to those mines every year. 83 percent of them are said to be civilians. Thrown into a tight corner by the international community's criticism, the U.S. declared that it would prohibit the use of all mines till 2010. But it said it would except the peninsula under the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty".
					
					 The number of the victims of those mines is on the steady increase in south Korea as it is outside the convention.
					
					 Huge U.S. forces are deployed in south Korea, Japan and other parts of Asia-Pacific. U.S. strategic nuclear striking means including nukes are massed there, and taskforce units are deployed there.
					
					 The U.S. aggressor forces in south Korea have recently been reinforced sharply.
					
					 The number of the U.S. forces in south Korea has increased as many as 11,000 as compared with September 2009, according to the "2012 report on the military base structure" released by the U.S. Defense Department.
					
					 Such ultra-modern military hardware as new type heavy tanks M1-A2 Abrams, MRAPs and F-16s were additionally deployed in the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 Such massive reinforcement of the U.S. forces in south Korea further escalates the tensions in the region and sparks the arms race and increases the danger of a war.
					
					 If peace is to settle on the peninsula, the U.S. must pull out of south Korea at once, taking with it all its military personnel and destructive military hardware.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses U.S. Nature as Harasser of Peace
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses U.S. Nature as Harasser of Peace
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State in a recent press interview said the measure of banning the use of anti-personnel mines will have nothing to do with defending the Korean peninsula in any form.
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and its foreign policy for aggression remain unchanged, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The mines planted in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line which divides Korea into two parts are the products of the U.S. strategy to dominate Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is regarding south Korea as a lever for putting pressure upon and containing hostile forces in realizing its strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region and a bridgehead for an advance into the continent.
					
					 The U.S. disclosed its intention to continue to use the anti-personnel mines in the areas along the MDL, an indication of its plan to persistently escalate military confrontation with the DPRK and continue to get hold of south Korea and turn it to good account in realizing its strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to convince the world of its "peace-loving stand" while availing itself of the international trend, but it is, indeed, a ridiculous act.
					
					 No matter what rigmarole the U.S. imperialists may resort to, they can never cover up their nature as the harasser of peace.
					
					 In order to ensure genuine peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, the U.S. should withdraw from south Korea at an early date, taking all its military personnel and lethal weapons.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Accept Special Proposal of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Accept Special Proposal of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin in a commentary on July 1 urged the south Korean authorities to accept the special proposal made by the DPRK.
					 The commentary said the south Korean authorities denied in fact the special proposal of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, disappointing the Koreans at home and abroad desirous of peace.
					
					 This shows, in the final analysis, that they do not have intent to improve the relations with the north, the commentary said.
					
					 The commentary recalled the assertion made by the minister of Unification of south Korea that it has exerted efforts to substantially improve the south-north ties by respecting all agreements reached between the south and the north including the July 4 joint statement and on the basis of confidence through dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 This only betrayed his ignorance of what are the contents of the July 4 joint statement and his lack of proper understanding of the principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity specified in it, the commentary added.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the south Korean authorities have not adhered to the principle of independence in the south-north ties, said the commentary, and continued:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have persistently violated the principle of peaceful reunification enshrined in the July 4 joint statement.
					
					 They also designated the north as "enemy", not considering it as their counterpart with whom to achieve the great national unity.
					
					 They should accept the special proposal of the NDC of the DPRK if they truly respect the July 4 joint statement.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respect Spirit of July 4 Joint Statement
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Respect Spirit of July 4 Joint Statement
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The spokesperson of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a commentary on July 2 demanding the south Korean authorities respect the spirit of the July 4 joint statement.
					 The statement which was agreed upon and announced by the north and the south for the first time since Korea's division is a precious one which demonstrated the will of the nation for reunification, the commentary said, and noted:
					
					 But the Park Chung-hee regime turned down the statement which carried the contents of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and opted for remaining in office long by cooking up the "yusin constitution".
					
					 The south Korean authorities are not accepting the special proposal of the north which reflects the spirit of the July 4 joint statement and the spirit of By Our Nation Itself. The present chief executive visited Pyongyang in 2002 and promised to pool efforts in order to implement the joint statement and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respect the spirit of the joint statement and opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Meets
articles.content:
Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Meets
Tokyo, July 8 (KNS-KCNA) -- The 9th plenary meeting of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification took place at the Korean Commercial Workers Hall in Tokyo on July 4.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), So Chung On, director of the Department for International Affairs and Reunification, Ri Tong Je, chairman of the association, and its officials and members.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was the congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the 23rd Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 Ri Tong Je noted in his report that the association has made positive contributions to putting spurs to the nation-wide movement for reunification by strengthening solidarity and alliance with compatriots in the north, the south and abroad despite the moves of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 He said that the association would more dynamically conduct political information service to put an end to outsiders' interference and realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country with the concerted efforts of compatriots, and take the lead in the nationwide struggle to usher in the second June 15 era.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Nam Sung U made a speech.
					
					 Ri Tong Je was reelected chairman of the association at the meeting.

articles.title: Official of Chongryon Supports Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Official of Chongryon Supports Statement of DPRK Government
Tokyo, July 8 (KNS-KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), made public a statement on July 7 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The statement of the DPRK government is giving all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad the new hope and conviction of the improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification and arousing patriotic enthusiasm for reunification among all Koreans in Japan, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The statement reflects the patriotic desire of the DPRK government to tide over the difficulties facing the nation, mend the inter-Korean relations and open a new turning phase of independent reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should resolutely break with the inglorious past and take a big step toward the new future for reunification.
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan will dynamically turn out in the nationwide struggle to usher in the second June 15 era under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding him as the lodestar of national reunification in high esteem.

articles.title: Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Organization of DR Congo
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The DR Congolese Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung issued its bulletin titled "July 8, 2014, the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the DPRK" on July 1.
					 The bulletin introduced the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by the President under the sub-titles of "Eternal sun of Juche", "Founder of Songun idea" and "Believing in people as in Heaven".
					
					 It said that the twenty years have passed since he passed away and progressive humankind looked back with deep emotion upon the great feats he performed for the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea and thus provided the guiding idea of the cause of independence.
					
					 The Juche idea ushered in the era of independence, the new era of history, in which the popular masses, who had only been subject to history regarding the life of slave as their inevitable fate in the past, are carving out the era and the path of the revolution independently and creatively as the master of their own destiny.
					
					 The bulletin praised the President for building the army, liberating the country and winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, saying that he pioneered the cause of independence with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership and guided it to victory.
					
					 It stressed that the President regarded it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven and solved all matters arising in the revolution and construction by relying on the popular masses. There is prospering DPRK today as it was led by him who gave ceaseless field guidance to meet the people even in the last period of his life, it added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Bulgarian Communist Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Bulgarian Communist Party
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Bulgarian Communist Party issued a statement on July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The President performed the immortal exploits on behalf of the country, people, times and revolution with his profound idea and theories and energetic revolutionary practice.
					
					 He clarified the idea and theories of the military affair by relying on the principle of Juche, directed great efforts to bolstering up the revolutionary armed forces all his life and always won victory in the showdown with the imperialists.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is the most precious legacy left by him.
					
					 He paid special attention to solving the issue of carrying forward the revolutionary cause and set the inheritance of the leader's idea as an important issue on which hinges the future of the revolution.
					
					 He regarded Korea's reunification as the noblest patriotic cause and devoted himself to strengthening the movement for national reunification.
					
					 He put forward the three principles of national reunification and made positive efforts to shatter all moves of the separatists inside and outside and achieve the unity between the north and the south.
					
					 He made great contributions to realizing the cause of global independence with his energetic external activities.
					
					 He is always alive as the model of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Beninese Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Beninese Political Figure
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was the most distinguished leader representing the 20th century, peerless great man and great sage of mankind, said Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, in a statement issued on July 3.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established the social system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK and set a good example in accomplishing the human cause of independence with his outstanding leadership.
					
					 He performed great feats in accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 He set forth fair and reasonable reunification proposals such as the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and vigorously led the movement for national reunification, opening up a rosy vista of Korea's reunification.
					
					 He also sincerely helped many countries in their efforts for national independence and independent development and energetically led the socialist movement, the Non-Aligned Movement and other progressive movements so that they remain faithful to their ideas and principles.
					
					 Although he passed away, his idea and cause are given a steady continuity.
					
					 I and all members of the Socialist Party of Benin pay highest tribute to him on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Officials Should Become Faithful Servants of the People" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on July 2. 
					 The work published on December 28, Juche 81 (1992) clarifies the tasks and ways for the officials to become faithful servants of the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Cambodia, Mongolia, France and Angola from June 21 to July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of all people.
					
					 He is the father of the Korean nation who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and devoted his all to Korea's reunification and the people's happiness.
					
					 He positively rendered the material and moral assistance to the Cambodian people in their struggle for national liberation.
					
					 The secretary general of the Mongolian Peace and Friendship Organization said that the President performed the great exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and his career would always be kept in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressive humankind.
					
					 The vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association praised the President for setting forth the important and fair proposals for Korea's reunification and peace and making immortal contributions to the reunification cause.
					
					 Figures of Angola lauded the President as the outstanding leader and peerless great man recognized by the world who devoted his all to the independence, liberation, prosperity and happiness of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung on June 30.
					 The Malaysian newspaper Guang Ming Daily carried an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and the Juche idea" accompanied with the photo of him acknowledging the enthusiastically cheering masses.
					
					 It said that the great exploits of the President would be conveyed along with the august name of the sun. It went on:
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by the President is that he founded the immortal Juche idea illuminating the road ahead of the times and humankind.
					
					 He pioneered the revolutionary cause of Songun under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 He defeated two formidable imperialist enemies in one generation and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He also dedicated his all to reunifying the country.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive humankind for his undying feats.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata carried an article titled "Socialist Korea and President Kim Il Sung" accompanied with his photo.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the President embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and achieved the immortal exploits on behalf of the times and history all his life.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya in an article titled "The DPRK and inheritance of the socialist cause" stressed that the President is the father of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Newspapers
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The July 2nd issue of the Russian newspaper Rio Panorama devoted one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun" accompanied with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It said:
					
					 What is the reason that the President is praised as the sun?
					
					 It is that he illuminated the road ahead of humankind with sunny beam, created the flower garden of human love and embraced all people with great charisma.
					
					 Although the President passed away, his idea and cause will shine forever as the sun does.
					
					 The July 2nd issue of the Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi and the seventh issue of another Russian paper Moya Interesnaya Gazeta carried articles under the titles such as "The prominent leader in the 20th century" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President. The articles introduced the exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The papers said that the President met nearly 70 000 foreigners with broad generosity and internationalist obligation and that he was presented with a lot of orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts by many heads of state, personages and international bodies even after his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of Czech Republic on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of Czech Republic on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem as Eternal President of Our Republic" was posted by the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on its website "Paektusan" on July 1. 
					 The work published on July 11 and 19, Juche 83 (1994) stresses the need to hold President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages and indicates the tasks for preserving and successfully inheriting and developing his idea and exploits. 
					
					 The website carried the portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on July 1. 
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to firmly defend their ideas and feats and add eternal brilliance to them.

articles.title: Acto central por 120o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Acto central por 120o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Hyong Jik
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 120o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Hyong Jik, indoblegable combatiente revolucionario y destacado dirigente del movimiento antijapones de liberacion nacional.
					Participaron en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las ramas de conservacion de lugares y materiales de interes historico-revolucionario, ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos, familiares de martires revolucionarios y trabajadores capitalinos, compatriotas en ultramar y sus delegaciones y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					La vida revolucionaria de Kim Hyong Jik fue la sagrada que se caracteriza por la lucha por cumplir el noble ideario "Jiwon" (gran proposito), comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					"Jiwon" es la concepcion de vida revolucionaria, segun la cual el valor y la felicidad estan en la lucha por la patria y la nacion.
					
					Igualmente, es indoblegable espiritu revolucionario que aboga por lograr sin falta la independencia del pais luchando de generacion en generacion.
					
					Su vida revolucionaria es el noble ejemplo a seguir por todos los militares y habitantes coreanos.
					
					Su vida esta penetrada de la idea de revolucion continua, o sea, impulsar la revolucion de generacion en generacion asumiendo las responsabilidades por el futuro de la nacion.
					
					Partiendo de su calido amor por las futuras generaciones de la revolucion, Kim Hyong Jik fundo por doquier las escuelas superando las dificultades surgidas en la lucha independentista antijaponesa y trabajo con dedicacion para educar a las generaciones venideras.
					
					El destacado dirigente condujo el movimiento antijapones de liberacion nacional de Corea por la senda de independencia nacional.
					
					El gran precursor trajo tambien el giro del movimiento nacionalista a la revolucion proletaria.
					
					Con su larga prevision, el revolucionario extraordinario preparo los recursos valiosos para forjar la causa revolucionaria del Juche e impulsarla victoriosamente.
					
					Estan impregnadas en los anales de la patria las sagradas actividades revolucionarias e inmortales hazanas de Kim Hyong Jik quien dedico todo lo suyo por la independencia del pais, la libertad y la liberacion del pueblo y el futuro brillante de la revolucion coreana, las cuales brillaran para siempre con la potencia del monte Paektu en prosperidad.
					
					El ideario "Jiwon" y el deseo de el se cumplieron exitosamente por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La revolucion coreana, que vino avanzando vigorosamente materializando ese ideario, acogio la nueva epoca de historia en que marcha adelante hacia la victoria final bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Todos deben glorificar el ideario "Jiwon" de Kim Hyong Jik y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en el monte Paektu.

articles.title: Fallecido Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Fallecido Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ACNC) -- El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea Jon Pyong Ho, director honorario del Museo de Armas del EPC, fallecio a los 88 anos de edad a las 19:00 del 7 de julio del 103(2014) de la Era Juche por agudo infarto del miocardio.
					Jon Pyong Ho fue un revolucionario veterano quien dedico todo lo suyo por la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, en acato a la direccion del Songun del Partido y el Lider.
					
					Nacido el 20 de marzo de 1926 en una pobre familia campesina del distrito de Jonchon de la provincia de Jagang, crecio como funcionario competente en el generoso regazo del partido y el Lider despues de la liberacion de la patria y dedico toda su vida en la rama de la industria para la defensa nacional.
					
					Al servir desde octubre de 1945 en la unidad de escolta bajo el amor y atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la heroina de la lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, lucho con valentia por frustrar las maniobras aviesas de los enemigos internos y externos y defender a riesgo de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Al fungir desde septiembre de 1952 hasta julio de 1970, de procesador, jefe de departamento e ingeniero-jefe de la fabrica de materiales belicos, hizo gran aporte a adelantar la victoria de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, asegurando la produccion de materiales belicos.
					
					Se esforzo con toda su alma por salvaguardar la soberania del pais y las conquistas de la revolucion materializando cabalmente la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de defensa nacional, presentada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Al trabajar desde agosto de 1970 de subjefe y jefe de departamento y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y desde junio de 2010 hasta marzo de 2012, de titular y secretario jefe del Comite del Partido de la Direccion Politica del Consejo de Ministros, hizo aporte especial a transformar el EPC, en el poderoso ejercito selecto y revolucionario dotado de modernos medios  ofensivos y defensivos, y la patria, en el pais fabricador y lanzador de satelites artificiales y poseedor de armas nucleares y trabajo con vigor para materializar la linea y la politica del Partido en materia de construccion economica.
					
					Al trabajar desde mayo de 2012 como director honorario del Museo de Armas del EPC, dedico todo su talento y entusiasmo a la labor para glorificar para siempre las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, acumuladas en la rama de la industria para la defensa nacional.
					
					Desde noviembre de 1970 hasta abril de 2012, trabajo de miembro suplente y miembro del CC del PTC y del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y fue electo como diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema desde la VII Legislatura hasta la XII de la APS y durante largo tiempo trabajo de miembro del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Por sus meritos logrados por el Partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, Jon recibio altas condecoraciones y premios estatales inclusive 2 Ordenes Kim Il Sung, una Orden Kim Jong Il, el titulo de dos veces Heroe de la RPDC y de Heroe del Trabajo.
					
					Fue promulgada el dia 7 la esquela de defuncion en nombre comun del CC del PTC y el CDN de la RPDC.
					
					El aviso subraya que aunque Jon Pyong Ho fallecio, se guardaran para siempre sus proezas acumuladas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					El CC del PTC y el CDN de la RPDC publicaron hacer los funerales del difunto como los de caracter nacional y constituyeron el Comite Funerario Estatal, cuyo presidente es el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y con 88 miembros inclusive Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y Hwang Pyong So.
					
					El Comite Funerario Estatal aviso que el feretro del difunto esta colocado en la Casa de Sojang del municipio de Pothonggang de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, recibira a los visitantes desde las 10:00 hasta las 19:00 del dia 9 y partira a las 08:00 del dia 10 el cortejo funebre del difunto.

articles.title: ACNC comenta posicion dual de EE.UU. en prohibicion de minas antipersonales
articles.content:
ACNC comenta posicion dual de EE.UU. en prohibicion de minas antipersonales
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ACNC) -- La conferencia de revision sobre la ejecucion del acuerdo de prohibicion de mina antipersonal (conocido generalmente como tratado de Ottawa), convocada recientemente en Mozambique, fue una ocasion en que se ha revelado la politica parcial de Estados Unidos en torno a la produccion y posesion de esas minas.
					Un portavoz del consejo de seguridad nacional de la Casa Blanca declaro en una nota que en el futuro, el gobierno de EE.UU. no producira ni comprara mas la mina antipersonal.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, un vocero del Departamento de Estado senalo que "la declaracion de cese de uso de minas no afecta la defensa de la Peninsula Coreana".
					
					Esto parte de la artimana de ocupar para siempre el suelo surcoreano para usarlo como puente de cabeza en funcion de la estrategia de tomar la hegemonia en Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Aunque entro oficialmente en vigor desde el primero de marzo de 1999 el tratado de Ottawa, que prohibe generalmente la produccion y uso de la mina antipersonal, llamada como "asesino escondido", la Peninsula Coreana sigue siendo una de las zonas donde se viola el mismo tratado.
					
					Se presume que el 70% de las minas antipersonales norteamericanas esta en el Sur de Corea y se totalizan en casi 2 millones y un millon las minas tipo no suicida y las plantadas que posee el ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					EE.UU., primer exportador de la mina antipersonal, bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "amenaza" de la RPDC, declaro desde el principio que no tiene ni la minima voluntad de eliminar en la Peninsula Coreana las minas diciendo que estas protegeran primero la vida de los soldados norteamericanos si se desata la guerra.
					
					Segun estimaciones, estan enterradas en ambito mundial mas de 100 millones de minas antipersonales que causa cada ano 26 mil victimas y el 83% de estas son civiles inocentes. 
					
					Perplejo ante las criticas de la sociedad internacional, EE.UU. se vio obligado a declarar que prohibira el uso de todas las minas hasta el 2010 con excepto a la Peninsula Coreana donde tiene el compromiso de defensa mutua.
					
					Ahora en el Sur de Corea se incrementa el numero de los civiles muertos o heridos por las minas.
					
					Ahora en el Sur de Corea, Japon y otras zonas de Asia-Pacifico estan desplegados muchos efectivos norteamericanos, ademas de los medios de ataque nuclear estrategico de EE.UU. y las unidades especiales moviles.
					
					En los ultimos anos, se aumentaron considerablemente las fuerzas agresoras yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					
					De acuerdo con el "informe sobre la estructura de bases 2012", publicado por el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU., el numero de los efectivos norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea marco un aumento de mas de 11 mil en comparacion con septiembre de 2009.
					
					En cuanto a los equipos belicos, se ubicaron adicionalmente en el Sur de Corea los tanques M1-A2, los coches antiminas, los cazas bombarderos F-16 y otros equipos belicos ultramodernos.
					
					El reforzamiento de tal presencia militar forma parte de las acciones de EE.UU. orientadas a provocar la guerra anti-RPDC, siendo el factor que agrava la situacion regional, la carrera armamentista y el peligro de guerra.
					
					Para asegurar la paz verdadera y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. debe sacar cuanto antes del territorio surcoreano todos sus efectivos y equipos mortiferos.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela naturaleza antipaz de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela naturaleza antipaz de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de julio (ACNC) -- En una reciente conferencia de prensa, un portavoz del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos dijo que el cese de uso de minas antipersonales no afecta de ninguna manera la defensa de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					Este anuncio significa por si solo que son invariables la politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la politica exterior agresiva de EE.UU. 
					
					Revela el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 9 y continua:
					
					Las minas sembradas en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar son productos de la estrategia norteamericana de dominar a Corea y la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					En vista de esa estrategia, EE.UU. considera el Sur de Corea como cabeza de puente para aplastar y resistir a sus fuerzas hostiles y avanzar al continente asiatico. 
					
					El intento de seguir usando las minas antipersonales plantadas en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar demuestra que EE.UU. sigue persiguiendo la confrontacion militar con la RPDC y quiere perpetuar la ocupacion del territorio surcoreano y utilizarlo para el cumplimiento de su estrategia de dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Son ridiculas las pretensiones de EE.UU. de obtener el reconocimiento a su "posicion pacifista" conforme a la tendencia internacional.
					
					El imperio no puede ocultar por nada su naturaleza antipaz. 
					
					Para preservar la seguridad y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. debe sacar del suelo surcoreano todos sus militares y equipos mortiferos.
